title: Ruth Winder
text: Ruth Joyce Winder (born July 9, 1993) is a British-born American professional cyclist, who currently rides for <a href="UCI%20Women%27s%20Team">UCI Women's WorldTeam</a> . She took up the sport as a teenager, and went on to turn professional with the in 2014. In July 2021 Winder announced that she would retire from professional competition at the end of the season. During the <a href="2021%20UCI%20Road%20World%20Championships">2021 UCI Road World Championships</a> in <a href="Flanders">Flanders</a>, she was elected to a four year term as a representative for road cycling on the <a href="Union%20Cycliste%20Internationale">Union Cycliste Internationale</a> Athletes' Commission, winning 83 percent of the vote.
